author: pbs.org
title: MotorWeek 5th Anniversary Episode MotorWeek
text: In this episode, we roll back the MotorWeek odometer to 1981 as we revisit some of the iconic vehicles we’ve tested. Pat Goss tracks the revolution in automotive technology over the years. We take a look at the evolution of car styling from then to now. Then, we’ll head down memory lane with us as we revisit some of the iconic vehicles we’ve tested.
